name: expo-dev-menu
description: Expo/React Native module with the developer menu.

scripts.bundle:dev:ios: NODE_ENV=development EXPO_BUNDLE_APP=1 react-native bundle --entry-file app/index.ts --platform ios --dev true --bundle-output assets/EXDevMenuApp.ios.js
scripts.bundle:prod:ios: NODE_ENV=development EXPO_BUNDLE_APP=1 react-native bundle --entry-file app/index.ts --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output assets/EXDevMenuApp.ios.js  --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:dev:android: NODE_ENV=production EXPO_BUNDLE_APP=1 react-native bundle --entry-file app/index.ts --platform android --dev true --bundle-output assets/EXDevMenuApp.android.js --assets-dest android/src/main/res
scripts.bundle:prod:android: NODE_ENV=production EXPO_BUNDLE_APP=1 react-native bundle --entry-file app/index.ts --platform android --dev false --bundle-output assets/EXDevMenuApp.android.js --assets-dest android/src/main/res

author: 650 Industries, Inc.
